main event: A glowing object was reported passing Altair, estimated to be metallic and size of a half silver dollar, believed to be a satellite.
interesting points: Sighting lasted for 15 minutes, Initial observations indicated a well-defined underwater trail, The object was evaluated as potentially being a satellite, The sighting included message transmissions to multiple military and intelligence agencies, The report indicates no unusual characteristics for the observed object.
sighted object: glowing object approximately the size of a silver dollar
